title: Rito please help me.
body: Riot please help me I am trying to change my email but every time when I press change email and type it in it keep sending the verify thing to my old email that I don't access no more **Please Help Me**.

replies.body:
In this case, you'll have to change your email with the assistance of our account specialists in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
